skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 8.6 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 6.3, Casting Spd. by 91%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting
skills.Description: Increases Casting Spd. by 5%.

skills.Name: Might
skills.Description: Increases P. Skill by 8% for 20 mins.

skills.Name: Resurrection
skills.Description: Resurrects a corpse. In addition, restores about 20% of XP.

skills.Name: Recharge
skills.Description: Recovers 50 MP. Cannot be used by classes that have Recharge skill.

skills.Name: Invocation
skills.Description: Recovers 10 MP every second for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Sleep
skills.Description: Causes the enemy to sleep for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Dryad Root
skills.Description: Immobilizes the enemy for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Holy Stance
skills.Description: Decreases damage received by 5% and increases Divinity Defense by 10, and applies Divinity to attribute magic.

skills.Name: Elemental Spike
skills.Description: Inflicts attribute damage with 22 power added to M. Atk. on the target and decreases the corresponding attribute defense. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Elemental Crash
skills.Description: Deals attribute damage to the target with ul power. Over-hit

skills.Name: Eva's Restoration
skills.Description: Eva's image is crystal clear in your mind, as you restore power within your ally. Restores 300 HP and an additional 18 HP every second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Vitalize
skills.Description: Recovers HP with 360 Power and cures minor poison/bleeding.

skills.Name: Eva's Embrace
skills.Description: You become a beacon of Eva's Power, restoring 230 Power on all party members and restore 17 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Eva's Power
skills.Description: Call upon Eva's Power to calm and heal the target. Restores 36 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Clarity
skills.Description: For 20 minutes, reduces the CD of physical skills and magical spells by 5%. Requires 1 Spirit Ore to Cast.

skills.Name: Cure Poison
skills.Description: Cures the target of moderate poisoning.
